metadata.title: CVE-2023-31315 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Improper validation in a model specific register (MSR) could allow amalicious program with ring0 access to modify SMM configuration while SMIlock is enabled, potentially leading to arbitrary code execution.

criterions.comment: amd64-microcode package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
